value:
$nMPID_マルス|Even though the fighting drags on,
everyone is in such high spirits. Truly,
festivals are magical times.

$nMPID_エリス|I doubt Marth recalls this, but he nearly
got left behind on the way to a festival
near the castle back home!

$nMPID_マルス|If you want to take a rest, Elice,
I'll happily patrol in your stead.

$nMPID_エリス|Look at the snow, white and glittering.
It is so beautiful. I wonder if our home
is also blanketed in snow...

$nMPID_エリス|Have you found presents for
everyone on your list? If you hold
them close to your heart, it's easy!

$nMPID_マルス|I want you to know that you're in
our thoughts this holiday season,
$Nu.

$nMPID_エリス|May the many honored fallen who
sacrificed everything in service of
Altea be blessed forevermore...

$nMPID_エリス|Is everyone all right? Please, bring
any injured to my side, that I may
tend their wounds.

$nMPID_マルス|This is no good... Without Jagen
and Cain here, I just can't focus!

$nMPID_エリス|Wonders never cease in this land.
I am certain Marth will grow into a
strong leader here.

It is very nice to meet you. I am Elice.
Thank you for all you've done for my
younger brother Marth.

$nMPID_マルス|I've only had a chance to see a little
bit so far, but this is a huge festival,
isn't it, $Nu?$k$p$nMPID_エリス|It seems so! Everywhere you look,
you see happy people. This land is so
beautiful too. But war yet persists...$k$p$nMPID_マルス|Oh, Elice. Please, try to forget the
troubles of the world and enjoy
yourself, if only for today.$k$pBrood too much and everyone will
only begin to fret.$k$p$nMPID_エリス|Very well. But look there, Marth!
That man! Is he ice-skating? Oh, no!
He fell... Let's go and see if he's hurt!$k$p$nMPID_マルス|I'm sure he's fine, Elice! You're so
concerned for others that I worry you
may lose sight of your own happiness.$k$p$nMPID_エリス|Oh, Marth. I am touched by your
concern, but you needn't worry
about me...$k$pI've already found someone who
makes me very happy, as Caeda
does you.
たあっ
えいっ
Impossible...!
It cannot be...!
$nMPID_二人|Bless us with strength!
$nMPID_二人| Elice! I'm here, Marth!
$nMPID_マルス|This is for you!
$nMPID_エリス|From the two of us!
ああっ…！
Forgive me... Elice...
Try not to wear yourself out.
I will enjoy this.

• "Here I go!"
• "Stay focused!"

• "Over here!"
• "Leave it to me!"
Laugh

• "Look, Elice, the snow is falling."
• "Yes... How beautiful..."
Right you are.
This way, Elice!
Shall we, Marth?

$nMPID_マルス|Elice! Come quickly. There's
something you have to see!

$nMPID_エリス|*giggle* You seem excited, Marth—
perhaps a bit too excited...?
$nMPID_マルス|Ah... My apologies. It's just that—

$nMPID_エリス|Oh, you needn't worry. I'm only
teasing. Truthfully, I'm happy to
do what you want.

$nMPID_マルス|And I'm happy to spend the winter
festival with you... I'm glad you're
enjoying yourself.

$nMPID_エリス|I had some reservations when I first
came to this world, but...with you
here, they've all fallen away...$k$pYou have matured quite a bit, Marth.

$nMPID_マルス|Maybe some...but I still have a ways
to go...

I trust your judgment—but I cannot
take credit!$k$pAny maturing on my part is all thanks
to the support of my friends. They
have always been faithful.
$nMPID_エリス|Marth...

$nMPID_マルス|It's true, though! Jagen, Cain, Abel,
Gordin...and so many more...$k$pCaeda too, of course. Their support
has been...a true gift.

$nMPID_エリス|Of course, of course... And Caeda...
her support must be an exceptional
gift, is it not?
$nMPID_マルス|Wh-what?!

$nMPID_エリス|Oh, and look here, Marth. Would this
necklace not make an exceptional gift
in return?$k$pIt would look stunning on Caeda...
$nMPID_マルス|No, no, that's not what I meant by—!

$nMPID_エリス|Just trust me, Marth—that is, if you
want Caeda to know how much you
appreciate her...$k$pAh! This ring is also quite pretty...

There is no greater delight than giving
gifts to those you care about.$k$pWhy don't we go look at some more
together...?

$nMPID_マルス|*sigh* You are right as ever, I
suppose... Thank you. Our time
together is another gift I'll cherish.
